sentences.sContent: No slipper is allowed in the laboratory.
sentences.sContent_eng: No slipper is allowed in the laboratory.
sentences.sCn: 不应在实验室穿著拖鞋。

sentences.sContent: The boy ran away with the big slipper though she was begging.
sentences.sContent_eng: The boy ran away with the big slipper though she was begging.
sentences.sCn: 那个男孩不管她怎么哀求，还是拿着那只大拖鞋跑开了。

sentences.sContent: My foot was rather sore, but I managed to ease it into a large slipper.
sentences.sContent_eng: My foot was rather sore, but I managed to ease it into a large slipper.
sentences.sCn: 我的脚很疼，不过我很小心地把它伸进一只大拖鞋里。
